meanings.sent1: She forgot her umbrella, nonetheless, she stayed dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: He was tired, nonetheless, he finished his homework.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase; nonetheless, it landed on its feet.
meanings.sent4: The team was losing, nonetheless, they fought until the end.
meanings.sent5: The storm was fierce, nonetheless, the sun shone through the clouds.

meanings.sent1: She was tired; nonetheless, she kept running.
meanings.sent2: He didn't want to go; nonetheless, he went to support his friend.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked burnt; nonetheless, it tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: The road was long; nonetheless, they reached their destination.
meanings.sent5: The movie was boring; nonetheless, she stayed until the end.
